content: in all sts until next corner* repeat *to* join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 16 double_crochet 60 half_double_crochet 4 chain 2 space fasten_off if you want to change colour round 9 if you change colour join to any chain 2 corner space if you don t change colour just slip_stitch to next st and then slip_stitch to chain 2 corner space chain 1 *3 single_crochet in chain 2 corner space 1 single_crochet in all sts until next chain 2 corner space* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 88 single_crochet thank you for choosing this pattern for your project when you make it i d like to see it remember to tag me @k a m e_crochet on instagram if you have any questions about the pattern please contact me at kamecrochet@gmail com or ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/mytia89 facebook https //www facebook com/kamecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/k a m e_crochet happy crocheting k a m e crochet designs 2019 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved
